video.title: Special Agent Oso
video.synopsis: This educational animated series follows the adventures of Oso, an adorable teddy bear who is training to be a special agent.

episodes.synopsis: Oso must make sure Stacy's Birthday card to Grandma gets in the mailbox.
episodes.title: To Grandma With Love / Gold Flower

episodes.synopsis: Oso helps Danny brush his teeth and Samantha fix her favorite book.
episodes.title: Never Say No Brushing Again / The Girl With the Golden Book

episodes.synopsis: Oso's Special Assignment is to help Abby learn to jump rope.
episodes.title: Live and Jump Rope / A View to a Kitten

episodes.synopsis: Oso's Special Assignment is to help Joe find a library book on dinosaurs.
episodes.title: A View to a Book / Diamonds are for Kites

episodes.synopsis: Oso helps Michael wrap a birthday present and helps Quinn make a party hat!
episodes.title: The Boy With the Golden Gift / Birthdays are Forever

episodes.synopsis: Oso's Special Assignment is to help Cassie find her ticket and ride the Carousel.
episodes.title: Carousel Royale / Leaf Raker

episodes.synopsis: Oso's Special Assignment is to help Grace pick strawberries for her family's lunch.
episodes.title: Thunder Berries / Flowers Are Forever

episodes.synopsis: Oso helps Jim and Mia get their pet bunny's cage ready for Show and Tell.
episodes.title: For Your Nice Bunny / For Pancakes With Love

episodes.synopsis: Oso must help Jake clean his room to find his soccer shoes.
episodes.title: License to Clean / On Her Cousin's Special Salad

episodes.synopsis: Special Agent Oso must teach David how to play Hide and Seek.
episodes.title: Hide Another Day / Live and Let Dry

episodes.synopsis: Special Agent Oso must help Addison and her family save water and power.
episodes.title: Dr. Off / License to Dress

episodes.synopsis: Oso helps Jack put a new puzzle together before dad gets home.
episodes.title: Octo-Puzzle / One Suitcase is Now Enough

episodes.synopsis: Special Agent Oso must help Paulie fix his wagon and deliver party supplies.
episodes.title: Three Wheels Are Not Enough / A Zoo to a Thrill

episodes.synopsis: Special Agent Oso must help Maria learn the team cheer.
episodes.title: The Girl Who Cheered Me / License to Twirl

episodes.synopsis: Oso's Special Assignment is to help Grayson get ready for Show and Tell.
episodes.title: For Show and Tell Only / Piggy Bank Royale

episodes.synopsis: Oso's Special Assignment is to help John and Alexis learn to play hopscotch.
episodes.title: Hopscotch Royale / Goldringer

episodes.synopsis: Oso must help Theo and Oliver get their flashlight to work before it gets dark.
episodes.title: The Living Flashlight / Sand Castle Royale

episodes.synopsis: Oso helps Tyler make frozen juice pops for his sister to take with her medicine.
episodes.title: License to Chill / Goldenfly

episodes.synopsis: Oso must help Tara tie her new lace up shoes so she can wear them to school.
episodes.title: Tie Another Day / You Only Start Preschool Once

episodes.synopsis: Oso helps Brianna make a pinecone birdfeeder and hang it in a tree.
episodes.title: Goldfeather / Live and Let Ride

episodes.synopsis: Oso helps Carlos and Jose buy groceries.
episodes.title: For Your Pies Only / The Plates Are Not Enough

episodes.synopsis: Oso's Special Assignment is to help Carina learn to ice skate.
episodes.title: For Your Ice Only / Coldfingers

episodes.synopsis: Oso helps Anna make her Daddy a Valentine's card.
episodes.title: Nobody Draws It Better / Thunderbubble

episodes.synopsis: Oso helps Joshua recycle his family's bottles, cans and paper.
episodes.title: Recycling is Forever / Goldswinger

episodes.synopsis: Oso gets assigned the task of helping a girl learn how to make paper airplanes; Oso teaches young Kayley how to play catch with her brother.
episodes.title: Another Way To Fly /A View To A Ball

episodes.synopsis: Oso teaches a girl how to race her brother's remote control car; a girl who is preparing for a sleepover needs help learning how to make her bed.
episodes.title: Dr. Go /For Your Bed Only

episodes.synopsis: While Oso is learning about gadgets, he gets an alert to help a boy who needs to use chopsticks; Oso has fun playing basketball with a boy named Pete.
episodes.title: For Your Hands Only/ Thunderbeam

episodes.synopsis: Oso is training with Dotty on emergency drills when he gets an alert about riding a scooter; Oso helps a girl who is teaching her brother to color.
episodes.title: Goldscooter /The Boy With The Colored Crayons

episodes.synopsis: Oso plays miniature golf with two boys who are practicing putting; Oso helps Sadie make a beautiful leaf rubbing for her grandmother's birthday.
episodes.title: Goldputter /Live And Leaf Rub

episodes.synopsis: Two youngsters want to make fresh-squeezed orange juice for their sick mother; Oso teaches Thomas how to blow his nose and wash his hands afterward.
episodes.title: Dr. Juice /For Your Nose Only

episodes.synopsis: Oso shows a little girl how to approach and pet a dog safely; Oso teaches a pair of twins how to play musical chairs at a party.
episodes.title: The Man With The Golden Retriever/ The Chairs Are Not Enough

episodes.synopsis: Oso helps a boy prepare a peanut butter and jelly sandwich for his school lunch; Oso joins Sophie in frosting and decorating muffins for a bake sale.
episodes.title: Quantum Of Sandwich /Thunder Muffin

episodes.synopsis: Oso and a young artist mix paints to make green for a pretty picture; Oso teaches Charlie the importance of washing his hands before eating.
episodes.title: Colors Royale / Cleanfingers

episodes.synopsis: Oso enjoys Halloween with a youngster who needs him to create a tiger mask out of a paper plate; Oso helps carve a pumpkin for a contest.
episodes.title: A View To A Mask / Pumpkin Eyes

episodes.synopsis: Oso is sad because he doesn't have anyone to spend the holidays with, but then he receives an alert to help three kids celebrate in different ways.
episodes.title: The Living Holiday Lights Part 1

episodes.synopsis: While his friends are away, Oso helps three children celebrate the winter holiday season in different ways.
episodes.title: The Living Holiday Lights: Part 2

episodes.synopsis: It's chilly fun when Oso teaches Liam how to make snow angels for his grandmother; winter moves indoors when Oso helps Ethan make a snow globe.
episodes.title: For Angels With Snow/ Dr. Snow

episodes.synopsis: Oso gets trained to ride a snowmobile before helping his friends go sledding; Oso cuts out some lovely paper snowflakes with a youngster.
episodes.title: License To Sled/ Snowflakes Are Forever

episodes.synopsis: It's Oso to the rescue when Lou needs to learn how to throw a football; Oso teaches young Alexander and Elena to play a game of tag.
episodes.title: Dr. Throw/ Nobody Plays 'It' Better

episodes.synopsis: Oso and Taylor are trying to figure out how to make less mess when eating spaghetti; Oso helps Lydia fold the clean laundry as a surprise for her mom.
episodes.title: Quantum of Sauce / The Girl with the Folded Clothes

episodes.synopsis: After receiving training on cliff climbing, Oso helps a girl water her plants; Oso teaches a youngster how to relax so she can fall asleep at bedtime.
episodes.title: Greenfinger / For Sleepy Eyes Only

episodes.synopsis: Oso helps Malcolm clean and bandage a scrape on his knee; Oso teaches Santiago how to feed his pet goldfish, Swimmy, by himself.
episodes.title: Live And Let Heal/ Goldenfish

episodes.synopsis: Oso helps Henry play "Old MacDonald" on the piano; Oso, Nicole and Spencer prepare for a Snapasonic concert by snapping their fingers.
episodes.title: On Old MacDonald's Special Song / Snapfingers

episodes.synopsis: Oso helps Anastasija order a healthy meal in a restaurant; Oso teaches Zack good table manners for a fancy dinner party.
episodes.title: License To Order/ Table Manners Are Forever

episodes.synopsis: Oso comes to the rescue when Juan gets separated from his family in a department store; Lena and Oso both have to apologize for making mistakes.
episodes.title: Lost And Get Found/ A View To The Truth

episodes.synopsis: Oso leads three little girls on a practice fire drill; Oso shows Maya how to buckle her seat belt by herself before she goes on a picnic with her mom.
episodes.title: A View To A Fire Drill/ Thunderbelt

episodes.synopsis: Oso takes to the kitchen when he and Audrey make healthy snacks for school; Oso goes to Greece to show Athena how to drink from a water fountain.
episodes.title: Quantum Of Celery/ Drink Another Day

episodes.synopsis: Eun-Kyung needs Oso's help to make a present for Mother's Day; Oso teaches Leah how to walk a balance beam so that she can join the gymnastics team.
episodes.title: For Your Hands Only/ Thunderbeam

episodes.synopsis: Alberto wants to be like his big brother and score a goal playing soccer; Oso helps Xavier sweep up his playroom before his friend comes over.
episodes.title: A View To A Goal/ Sweep Another Day

episodes.synopsis: It's dance time for Oso when he teaches Mia and Lin how to freeze-dance; Wyatt wants to build a fort out of a cardboard refrigerator box.
episodes.title: Freeze Dance Royale/ The Boy With The Carboard Fort

episodes.synopsis: Madison needs help saying goodbye to her best friend, who is moving away; Oso supports a nervous little boy on his first day of kindergarten.
episodes.title: Best Friends Are Forever/ For School Days Only

episodes.synopsis: Oso heads to the kitchen to make tamales with Carmen; Oso helps two brothers prepare a beautiful piñata for their sister's quinceañera.
episodes.title: For Tamales With Love/ Pinata Royale

episodes.synopsis: It's playtime for Oso and friends when he helps Lucia make a sock puppet; Oso puts together a princess costume for Lainie for a tea party.
episodes.title: Sock Puppet Royale/ Costume Of Solace

episodes.synopsis: Gavin wants to cheer up his sad friend, so he calls on Oso for help; two girls send an alert for Oso when they need to vote on which game to play.
episodes.title: License To Cheer Up/ You Only Vote Once

episodes.synopsis: Oso is having a bad training day and to make things worse, he accidentally shrinks himself and his friends with Professor Bufo's new shrinking ray!
episodes.title: Thundersmall

episodes.synopsis: It's time for arts and crafts when Oso helps Min construct a paper fan for her mother; Oso shows Dimitri how to draw a connect-the-dots picture.
episodes.title: Goldfanner / Connect Another Dot

episodes.synopsis: Oso teaches some young friends how to share; courtesy is the name of the game when Oso teaches Jordan how to be polite when having a conversation.
episodes.title: License To Share / Live And Be Polite

episodes.synopsis: Oso helps Faith be comfortable with a new baby sitter; Oso teaches Aiden how to use the potty.
episodes.title: The Sitter Who Watched Me / Potty Royale

episodes.synopsis: While Oso is showing David how to fix his broken bicycle and ride it, he learns a valuable lesson himself about asking for help when he needs it.
episodes.title: The Manny With The Golden Bear

episodes.synopsis: Gabriel and Chiara call on Oso for help coloring pretty hard-boiled eggs for Easter; Oso helps Jasmine learn how to skip like her big sister.
episodes.title: Dye Another Egg/ Dr. Skip

episodes.synopsis: Oso has lots of fun when he shows Adam how to hit a baseball; Oso teaches Raphael and his friends how to play Duck, Duck, Goose.
episodes.title: Diamonds Are For Baseball/ Tomorrow Never Ducks
